longdesc.p: Routemap is a jquery mobile plugin to render a route data.
Routemap draws the lines between above two stations automatically, and it indicates a shortest or minimum transfer route between two stations that a user selected

Routemap supports JSON for DB ( routemap data ), so it's possible to set DB by setting a file path or a variable on widget, and it allows us to modify each style of stations, routes, and labels easily
And also, it supports a multi-language.
To create a routemap, create a container and add the data-role="routemap" attribute. Using data-db attribute allows you to set a DB for the lines, stations, label and each style.

desc.p: The URL of a JSON file or a javascript variable to load.
Determine the current languauge. The values must be the abbreviation of language names(ex: English > en )
The length unit of the route map. If the value is 10 and a station coordinate is (1, 2) then the station will be displayed at (10, 20).

event.name: create
event.desc: Triggered when a routemap is created

event.name: select
event.desc: Triggered when station or line are selected

method.name: getIdsByName
method.desc: Gets an array of station/line ids associated with the specified station name or line name.

argument.name: name
argument.desc: The name of station or line.

method.name: getNameById
method.desc: Gets a string of station or line name with associated the specified station or line id.

argument.name: id
argument.desc: The id of station or line

method.name: shortestRoute
method.desc: Returns an array of station id which is the shortest route from source to destination.

method.name: minimumTransfers
method.desc: Returns an array of station ids which is the route having minimum transfers from source to destination.

method.name: highlight
method.desc: Add highlight styles to station or line.

method.name: dishighlight
method.desc: Removes a highlighting style from stations.
method.p: if there are no arguments, all of highlighting style will be removed

method.name: refresh
method.desc: Resizes&redraws the widget, after having made some external modifications.

argument.name: redraw
argument.desc:
When set to true, the widget will redraw all of elements by a route data.
Only re-layout the widget if set to false.
